text: Area code 870 is a telephone area code in the North American Numbering Plan (NANP). It is used in the state of Arkansas in the United States. It was established in 1997 as a split from 501. It covers a large portion of eastern and northern Arkansas, such as Jonesboro, Pine Bluff, Texarkana, West Memphis, and the Arkansas Delta region. It was overlaid by 327 on February 20, 2024. 870
title: Area code 870
